actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts not in excess of $500 a year received by volunteer firemen shall not be subject to income tax.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, that amounts not in excess of $500 a year received by a volunteer firemen shall not be subject to income tax. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 124)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts not in excess of $500 a year received by volunteer firemen shall not be subject to income tax.
